attributes.action: Ban political donations from non-British citizens
attributes.additional_details: To protect UK democracy from foreign interference, we must ensure political parties are funded only by British citizens. Allowing donations from non-citizens risks compromising national sovereignty, undermining transparency, and reducing public trust in our elections. A ban will safeguard fairness, ensure funding reflects the electorate's will, and maintain confidence in our democratic process.
attributes.background: Enact legislation to ban political donations from non-British citizens. Ensure strict verification processes for compliance and severe penalties for breaches, safeguarding UK democracy from foreign interference and restoring public trust.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
